entry.string: Where the glossary items are held
entry.translation: Vhere-a zee glussery items ere-a held

entry.string: Choose the publication type for the glossary.
entry.translation: Chuuse-a zee poobleeceshun type-a fur zee glussery.

entry.string: Choose the category for the glossary.
entry.translation: Chuuse-a zee cetegury fur zee glussery.

entry.string: How the glossary block is invoked
entry.translation: Hoo zee glussery bluck is infuked

entry.string: The name of the glossary parameter to trigger the block.
entry.translation: Zee neme-a ooff zee glussery peremeter tu treegger zee bluck.
